Career Objective:
I am looking for an opportunity to work with a progressive Organization to 
make use of my skills towards the growth of the organization and become an 
asset to the team I work for by learning new set of skills which are needed to 
achieve professional goals.
Technical Qualification:
Diploma in Mechanical Engineering (Polytechnic) {65.16%}
(Punjab State Board of technical education ) 2011 to 2014
Academic Qualification:
High School Passed In CBSE Board 2010 (58.9%) (CGPA): 06.2



punjab
( Mechanical maintenance of parts of hydraulic and pneumatic cylinder and 
machine ) 
From January 2013to April 2014_


( Computer Operating and production handling of two wheeler bike at 
assembling line )
 From july2014 to July 2015_

Working in UFLEX.LTD Sector-60 Noida   packaging division, converting 
unit. 
( Machine operation and there maintenance of machine like Converpinch big 
pouch making machine, polytex tube making machine convertex  cement bag 
making machine, tuber machine and 3d pouching machine ) 
From July 2015 –till date
Designation: 

 Supervisor 

Working role – Mechanical   in-charge/Foreman
Responsibilities: 
Execute the mechanical issues as per machine problem (tool/machine problems,
Rework of parts etc) contributing to line stoppages.
Monitoring every day’s mechanical issues and discuss with superior to solve any
issues related to mechanical stoppages.
Achieve a high level of mechanical efficiency.
Control of manpower as per shift schedule.
To maintain Hygiene and Good Manufacturing practices (GMP) norms of plant.
Key skills:


Machine  maintenance,  hydraulic  &  pneumatic  cylinder  maintenance,
Manufacturing,  production  planning,  shift  management,  production
management
